translation.en: The blue indicates water. The red is oxygen.
This is our best chance to find a habitable planet.
translation.ko: 거주 가능한 행성으로 가장 유력한 곳이죠

translation.en: One we can colonize and so ensure the survival of our species.
translation.ko: 인류의 생존을 위해선 그곳을 개척해야 합니다

translation.en: With the deteriorating situation here on Earth,
it's essential we send a scouting mission as soon as possible.
translation.ko: 지구의 상황을 생각하면 당장이라도 탐사대를 보내야 합니다

translation.en: The voyage there will take 86 years.
So, the crew will reproduce onboard the ship,
and their grandchildren will be the ones who reach the planet.
translation.ko: 승무원들이 탐사선에서 낳은 자녀와 손주들이 그 행성에 도착하는 당사자가 되겠죠

translation.en: Our first challenge was finding 30 qualified crew members
translation.ko: 적격자 30명을 찾는 게 첫 번째 난관이었죠

translation.en: able to cope with the stress of prolonged confinement.
That and the knowledge that they won't be coming back.
Our solution, breed and raise our own crew.
translation.ko: 결국 우리가 승무원을 인공적으로 낳아 키우고

translation.en: Train them in isolation, so they won't miss Earth.
translation.ko: 지구를 그리워하지 않게 격리 훈련 하기로 했죠

translation.en: Then the next step is to assess when they'll be ready to go.
translation.ko: 다음으로 생각할 것은 준비가 완료되는 시기입니다

translation.en: The younger they are, the longer we can conserve resources
translation.ko: 승무원들이 어릴수록 물자 소모량이 적어서 긴 탐사가 가능합니다

translation.en: and extend the timeline of the mission.
translation.ko: 물자 소모량이 적어서 긴 탐사가 가능합니다

translation.en: But they will be on the ship alone.
And while I have every confidence in our education and management system,
be able to combat the dangers they may face along the way.
translation.ko: 위험과 맞서야 할 상황도 있을 겁니다

translation.en: Some we're just beginning to understand.
translation.ko: 그 점을 깨닫기 시작한 아이들도 있습니다

translation.en: How would you solve that one?
There's nothing to be scared of.
I want to go with them.
It's a one-way trip, Richard. There's no coming back.
The whole reason we're raising them this way is for their mental health.
translation.ko: 아이들을 이렇게 키운 건 정신 건강 때문이었어

translation.en: So they don't miss wide open spaces, sunlight, people.
translation.ko: 트인 공간이나 햇살이나 사람을 그리워하지 않게

translation.en: Now you, on the other hand, are gonna have a hard time dealing with…
It's not part of the plan.
I know, but think of it like this.
You'll be able to launch sooner
Someone should be there to raise them.
Go main engines. Three, two, one…
You are the link between past and future generations
and have been entrusted with the survival of our species.
You will have children onboard the ship,
and your grandchildren will be the ones to reach the planet.
during each generation's 24th year in order to maximize resources.
Well, we're the first generation, so we won't ever see the planet.
translation.ko: 우린 첫 세대니까 그 행성을 못 봐요

translation.en: We'll never know what they discover.
my life is as important as anyone's.
Not supposed to let anyone see these.
That is my father and his parents.
I never knew them, but I know they lived an honest life.
translation.ko: 저분들을 모르지만 정직한 삶을 사셨단 건 알아

translation.en: You know, they took care of their family, they provided for the future.
That's all any of us can do.
There's a toxin in the irrigation water.
Well, replace the filter and test it again.
It's coming from us, it's in our urine.
Yeah, it's from something we've eaten.
Maybe toxic for a plant that relies solely on water, but…
What is it? What's the chemical?
What do you make of this?
It's an ingredient in something we eat.

translation.ko: "T56j 정보 열람 불가" 왜 열람 불가지?

translation.en: How'd you get past the firewall?
By connecting directly to the processor.
It's the same way I got into the design plans.
-It's not there. -Is it some kind of vitamin?
"…the active ingredient in daily beverage A.02."
translation.ko: "관리자 외 열람 금지" '일일 음료에 포함된 A.02 유효 성분'

translation.en: "Combine with blue alkaline syrup to counter stomach irritation."
"…effect is enhanced when consuming it with food."
I thought it was just an enzyme for digestion.
They don't want us to reproduce naturally.
They don't want us to have sexual relations.
So we don't feel what that feels like.
translation.ko: 그럼 그 느낌도 모르게 되는 거잖아

translation.en: And so we don't overpopulate the ship.
What else aren't they telling us?
Well, Christopher found a hidden compartment.
In Pod-23. Unmarked behind a wall.
Don't tell Richard you went off the blue.
translation.ko: 약 끊은 거 리처드한테 말하지 마

translation.en: He's going to force them back on it anyway.
Yeah, maybe. By then, we'll know what it feels like.
translation.ko: 그때면 어떤 느낌인지 다들 알게 될걸

translation.en: Has anything changed since you stopped?
You know that's a waste of electricity.
What have you been thinking about since our last session?
translation.ko: 저번 상담 후로 생각해 본 건 있니?

translation.en: Well, I guess I was wondering…
why do you lie to us?
What do you think I lied about?
Well, mission withholds certain information for various reasons.
I don't know. It must be for the third generation.
But why's it hidden? Aren't you curious?
It's probably reserved for them. It's…
I mean, you're going to have children, and you're going to have grandchildren.
translation.ko: 참 대단한 일이지 자녀도 생기고 손주가 생긴다는 거

translation.en: What do you think about that?
Yeah, they're normal kids. They're sensitive and smart,
which means they know when I'm not telling them the truth. And that's my point.
I want to be honest with them about everything.
I'm going to need a quick response from you on this.
No, you're not. Neither am I.
I don't know. You've changed. Everything about you.
That's exactly what I want to talk to you about.
You have, but you're not feeling what I'm feeling.
translation.ko: 컸는데도 나와 같은 걸 못 느끼잖아

translation.en: Easy with the hands. You know the rules.
Richard says it's the cooling and contracting of the ship when we power down.
translation.ko: 리처드가 탐사선이 냉각되면서 선체에서 나는 소리랬어

translation.en: I don't think the temperature differential is enough to affect the structure that way.
translation.ko: 온도 차가 선체 구조에 영향을 주긴 어려워

translation.en: You think it's something on the outside, don't you?
If there's life on the planet, why not out here?
translation.ko: 그 행성에 생명체가 있다면 여기도 없으란 법 없지

translation.en: What else can explain those sounds?
Plant that grows in warm climates.
He can touch her. But I can't.
because overnight there was a malfunction in the LCT transmitter.
I'll have to go exterior to fix it. Zac will come with me.
And the rest of you know your roles.
This sensor goes on your wrist and it attaches here,
translation.ko: 손목에 센서가 있고 이쪽에 붙어 있어

translation.en: but it's tricky because it can come loose, so just make sure…
Make sure you pull the cuff over the inner sleeve so that it…
What's happening here? Zac, what are you doing?
You're gonna lose food rations if you don't tell me what's going on.
No. But I heard what he did.
Has he done anything like that before?
I don't know, but he stopped taking the blue.
I saw him pour it out.
Good, I'm glad to hear it.
It's a drug. You're drugging us.
Mission made a decision to administer medication…
To prevent exactly this kind of thing from happening.
It's the only way to deal with living like this.
We didn't ask to be here.
Nobody chooses what they're born into.
But you have to find a way to live your life. You gotta…
decide what kind of person you want to be.
You gotta try to be good.
We're just gonna die in the end, so why can't we do what we want?
translation.ko: 어차피 죽을 건데 왜 맘대로 못 해요?

translation.en: What's the difference whether we're good or not?
-There's a big difference. -Well, I don't see it.
Are we still doing the repair?
Look, I get that you're angry,
but I need your help with this.
And the sooner we fix it,
the sooner you can voice your objections to mission control.
-Kai, you ready in the systems room? -Yes.
Med Bay on one with vital signs.
Shut down power to LCT 1 transmitter.
Richard told us what it is.
Richard! Do you read me, Richard? What happened?
We have a fire in the systems room.
The whole system's down. We're not transmitting or receiving.
No, keep the oxygen. We're going to go again.
It says the chief medical officer should note the time of death.
-You didn't see it? -I was facing the other way.
translation.ko: 너 못 봤어? 반대쪽 보고 있었어

translation.en: Like a force jumping into him.
What do you mean? Like a meteoroid?
What's going to happen to us?
Whatever it was, it was on the outside. We're safe inside the ship.
translation.ko: 밖에 있던 게 뭐든 이 안에선 안전해

translation.en: We were going to be on our own at some point anyway.
If we keep it together, we'll be all right.
So we can't see what happened?
translation.ko: 그럼 어떻게 된 건지 못 봐?

translation.en: The fire in the systems room destroyed the surveillance archive.
translation.ko: 시스템실 화재 때문에 감시 기록이 날아갔어

translation.en: The program says we need to choose a new chief officer.
it makes sense that I be chief.
I don't want to be chief.
It says everyone gets a vote.
And the new chief officer is…
First thing we have to do is repair the damage.
The LCS is down, so we won't be hearing from Earth until we fix it.
translation.ko: LCS가 망가져서 고칠 때까진 지구와 교신 못 해

translation.en: but we can work our way out of this.
We'll need the entire crew in the damaged area working on the repairs.
translation.ko: 전원이 파손 구역에서 수리를 거들어야 돼

translation.en: The fire knocked out most of the systems room.
We'll look at electrical and communications first.
Pull out all the burned equipment and replace it.
Then we'll work on the surveillance system.
Try to get it up and running so we can see what really happened to Richard.
translation.ko: 리처드가 어떤 일을 당했는지 확인해 보자

translation.en: Edward said the fire destroyed all the surveillance.
But maybe the drives are still intact.
What are you doing in here?
I'm supposed to destroy his personal archive.
translation.ko: 리처드 개인 기록 내가 파기해야 돼

translation.en: They don't want us to see it.
Do I have to do it?
That's Richard when he was ten.
-We only have genetic donors. -It's the same.
We still get our natures from them.
Why did he show you all this?
He wanted someone to talk to.
We saw… We saw him touching you.
-And we thought that you and Richard… -I didn't do anything with Richard.
translation.ko: - 우린 너랑 리처드가… - 아무 짓 안 했어

translation.en: He showed me his things. He would tell me about his life.
translation.ko: 이런 것들을 보여주고 자기 삶을 얘기해 줬을 뿐이지

translation.en: I'm not gonna be able to keep up the count…
It's hard to explain. On one hand, I…
I didn't feel like I had anybody at home.
seemed like my only relationship, so…
I didn't want to lose that.
And then, on the other hand, I believe it's a noble mission,
in the great tradition of exploration.
What's out there? Why are we here?
translation.ko: '저긴 뭐가 있을까? 우린 왜 여기 있을까?'

translation.en: I won't get to see the answer, but…
maybe I can move us a little closer to it.
But I think the real reason why I came is,
translation.ko: 사실 내가 여기 온 진짜 이유는

translation.en: I wanted to make sure they're okay.
And I want to protect them.
How's it going with the surveillance?
Why isn't everyone at their jobs?
We have to repair the damage. We have to secure the ship.
What are you doing in here?
That short circuit cut the power to the refrigerators.
We're doing everything we can to get them back before we lose any food.
But there's a bunch of food we need to eat before it goes bad and…
translation.ko: 근데 상하기 전에 먹어둘 게 많아서

translation.en: Well, I was thinking we could have a party.
To celebrate our new chief officer.
Don't drink the blue. Don't drink it.
Richard isn't here to protect you.
I don't need him to protect me.
She doesn't want me to touch her.
Looking for Sela? She's in the Med Bay. I just saw her.
Looks like you got here fast.
No, you don't understand. He was coming in here to get you.
translation.ko: 그런 게 아니야 널 노리고 온 거라 내가 도와준 거야

translation.en: -I was trying to help you. -Why don't you help the rest of the crew?
translation.ko: 널 노리고 온 거라 내가 도와준 거야 나머지 애들이나 도와주지 그래

translation.en: It's getting out of control. You're the leader.
translation.ko: 통제 불능이잖아 네가 리더니까 어떻게든 해야지

translation.en: You should do something about it.
You knew I was going to find Sela, and you went right to her.
translation.ko: 내가 셀라 찾는 거 알고 있었잖아

translation.en: You need to leave her alone.
You think 'cause you're chief officer, you can tell me what to do?
I'm telling you as a friend.
-Stay away from her. -I'll do what I want.
translation.ko: - 건드리지 마 - 내 맘대로 할 거야

translation.en: Kai! What are you doing, Kai?
Tayo… Tayo, get down from there.
You're not supposed to put your feet where you're eating.
translation.ko: 식사하는 자리에 발 올리면 안 돼

translation.en: And then I want everyone in the common room.
It's not how we resolve our conflicts.
Also, some of us aren't doing our work.
translation.ko: 그리고 자기 임무를 안 하는 사람이 있어

translation.en: Why should we if no one else does?
translation.ko: 딴 애들도 안 하는데 우리가 왜 해?

translation.en: Because if you don't, who will?
We have to repair the damage and safeguard the ship.
I want everyone finishing those two jobs.
Then everyone should be in the systems room.
No. Now we're working on the food supply.
You haven't been working on the food anyway.
And if we don't, the mission won't survive.
And it's our job to support them. To lay the groundwork.
translation.ko: 우린 그들을 위해 기초를 까는 거야

translation.en: Who cares about them? We'll be dead.
translation.ko: 우린 죽을 건데 걔들이 무슨 상관이야

translation.en: Listen, we're going to get that whole section up and running, and everyone's going to work on it.
translation.ko: 탐사선이 돌아가게 하려면 다 같이 일해야 돼

translation.en: I don't want to work in the systems room.
He thinks the alien is living in there.
What? That doesn't make any sense.
He says we brought it inside with Richard.
Now it's hiding in the damaged area.
I, for one, don't know if there is an alien.
Who cares what you don't know?
If we repair the damage, we can watch the surveillance video and see…
I've got a right to talk.
You talk too much as it is, you bloated, wheezing blister.
translation.ko: 말이 너무 많아 고름 떡진 면상

translation.en: Who are you? Telling people what to do.
And why should that make any difference?
It's in the program. It's in the rules.
We're strong, we can do what we want.
translation.ko: 우린 강해 맘대로 할 수 있어

translation.en: Stop it! Both of you. Stop!
I'm not listening to Christopher anymore.
-You're not a leader. -I'm trying to keep us on track.
Anyone who wants to follow me can.
-I'll make more food. -That's our food, too.
translation.ko: - 식량을 더 주지 - 우리 식량이기도 해

translation.en: And I'll protect you from the alien. Especially if he's inside the ship now.
You're just trying to scare them.
Are you calling me a liar?
Zac, why are you doing this?
He doesn't know how to feed you.
And I'm not going to listen to him anymore.
translation.ko: 난 쟤 말 이제 안 들어

translation.en: Anyone who wants to be a part of my group is welcome.
translation.ko: 내 그룹에 오고 싶으면 누구든 환영이야

translation.en: We'll have more food, so we're strong.
Strong enough to fight the alien, strong enough to kill it.
translation.ko: 외계인과 싸울 정도로 외계인을 죽일 정도로

translation.en: What if Zac is right about the alien?
If we can just get that surveillance drive, then we can see what really happened.
translation.ko: 감시 장치만 고치면 어떻게 된 건지 알 수 있어

translation.en: You don't think it's living in there, do you?

translation.ko: 지금 시스템실에 누가 있지? 아무도 없어

translation.en: -Get behind it. -Try to close the door.

translation.ko: - 뛰어, 어서 가! - 뭐야, 왜 그래?

translation.en: -There was really something in there? -What was it?
It was dark. We couldn't see.
Start shutting down the transmitter circuits now.
It's pretty damaged. You can't see anything.
- Copy that. -Let's try a different angle.
It's not as bad as it looks.
Zac and Kai were in the systems room right after you left.
They said they saw the alien.
It wasn't there when I was inside.
There are pieces of the surveillance unit everywhere.
It doesn't matter. We have all the data right here.
But if it was Zac and Kai, they did it for a reason.
translation.ko: 잭과 카이 짓이라면 이유가 있을 거야

translation.en: It was supposed to be me.
You should give him a little zap for his trouble.
He knew it was the ship all along.
Is he touching the cable? Yes. But his gloves are insulated.
translation.ko: - 케이블 만지고 있어? - 응, 근데 장갑 꼈어

translation.en: Not until we decide what to do.
Why have they all gone crazy?
Maybe this is what they're really like.
We have our rules that keep us in line,
but deep down, maybe this is our true nature.
It can't be. I'm not like that.
translation.ko: 그럴 리 없어 난 안 그래

translation.en: And the crew will be on our side once they know the truth.
translation.ko: 애들도 진실을 알면 우리 편에 설 거야

translation.en: We're not going away. We're coming in.
I see I'm breaking up a nice little thing here.
Now I know we've had some disagreements in the past.
translation.ko: 서로 의견 차이가 있던 건 알지만

translation.en: We're going to put all that behind us.
and that's the way it's gonna be.
From now on, we'll do the work,
but we'll do it when we want and how we want.
will have to answer to me.
The alien's somewhere in the ship.
We'll fight it again if we have to, and we'll defeat it.
translation.ko: 필요하다면 또 싸우고 이번엔 이길 거야

translation.en: You'll be safe now 'cause I'll protect you.
It was supposed to be me.
You should give him a little zap for his trouble.

translation.ko: 반응이 없어 - 케이블 만지고 있어? - 응, 근데 장갑 꼈어

translation.en: Yes, but his gloves are insulated.
translation.ko: - 케이블 만지고 있어? - 응, 근데 장갑 꼈어

translation.en: Not out there, not in here. There's only Zac.
translation.ko: 밖에도 안에도 없고 잭이 지어낸 거야

translation.en: He's been lying to you the whole time.
But now you know the truth.
You've seen it with your own eyes.
Zac should go to his compartment while we consult the program.
translation.ko: 규정을 찾는 동안 잭을 구금해야 돼

translation.en: Then we'll decide what to do.
But I did it… for you.
I did it to protect you.
I did it because I saw the alien in him.
translation.ko: 너희를 지키기 위해서 리처드 안에 있는 외계인을 봤으니까

translation.en: and then Christopher brought it inside.

translation.ko: - 크리스토퍼가 데려온 거야 - 웃기지 마 잘못한 거지

translation.en: He knew something was wrong, but he did it anyway.
He brought the alien into the ship.
Just watch the rest of the video.
I killed Richard to protect the crew,
but now the alien's inside the ship somewhere.
We need to find out where so we can stop it.
We've been drugged and betrayed and programmed by liars,
translation.ko: 약을 먹이고 우릴 배신했어 이젠 프로그램 따윈 따를 수 없어

translation.en: but we're not going to follow the program anymore.
translation.ko: 이젠 프로그램 따윈 따를 수 없어

translation.en: but we won't just lay down and give up.
translation.ko: 하지만 마냥 포기하고 나자빠져 있진 않을 거야

translation.en: We won't be terrorized. We'll fight back, we'll find it!
translation.ko: 무서워하면 안 돼 찾아서 싸워야 해

translation.en: Now maybe it's hiding in someone else.
translation.ko: 이젠 다른 사람 안에 숨어있을 거야

translation.en: Yes. We'll find it and kill it.
translation.ko: - 그래, 찾아서 죽일 거야 - 아니면 너

translation.en: He had the alien inside of him.
Unless it's you who has it inside.
Grab anything that can be used as a weapon.
translation.ko: 무기로 쓸 만한 거 아무거나 들어

translation.en: We have to arm ourselves to fight.
We need something that will make him back down.
Maybe we should just give up.
But there's nothing we can do right now.
We accused him of murder. He's not going to forget that.
I mean, that's all he really wants anyway.
translation.ko: 그걸 원하는 거니까 들어가서 기회를 보자

translation.en: -Maybe later we can detain him. -That's right.
translation.ko: 그걸 원하는 거니까 들어가서 기회를 보자 맞아

translation.en: Eventually, things will calm down and be okay.
Right now, it is too dangerous. We can't stay separate.
translation.ko: 지금은 너무 위험해 따로 있으면 안 돼

translation.en: There's no way to fight him. We don't have any weapons.
I was watching his video diary, and he said you knew about the weapons.
translation.ko: 영상 일기에서 그랬어 네게 무기를 들켰다고

translation.en: Must be for the third generation.
That's not going to help us.
We can say we want to join his group.
All we need is a moment.
Or he's going to kill us.
-What do we do? -We stay in here.
We should go out there, talk to them.
Tell them we don't want to fight. And then…
You can say whatever you want to say right here.
I want to be with you.
You want to join my group,
or you want to be with me?
I'm glad you've finally come to your senses.
is I don't want you to.
You want to be with me,
but I don't want to be with you.
Don't you see? All of this is against our nature. This is not who we are.
translation.ko: 본성과 반대로 가잖아 이건 우리가 아니야

translation.en: But we don't have to act this way.
We can think. We can decide to be different.
translation.ko: 생각할 수 있고 다른 결정을 내리…

translation.en: We can decide which is better.
translation.ko: 더 나은 결정을 내릴 수 있어

translation.en: We're trying to make sense here and you're not listening.
To have rules and agree or… Or to run wild and fight?
Do you want to listen to reason and figure out a plan, or do you want to…
translation.ko: 이성의 말에 귀 기울이고 규정을 따르지 않으면…

translation.en: You see what I can do?
You go that way. I'll check down here.
Check in the vats. Check in the refrigerators.
-No way they could fit. -Check all of them.
Go see if we got them.
Check the drawers, try to find something.
Next to you, in the cabinet.
If we go out, we'll never get back in.
How do we make sure it doesn't happen again?
And as we begin our journey,
I think about the world we are leaving behind and…
how I've seen it at its best and its worst
we'll have our own bad times.
I mean, they're coming, there is nothing I can do about it.
translation.ko: 그런 일이 찾아오는 건 막을 수 없어요

translation.en: But I also know that you will prevail.
And our best will live on.
And the new Chief is… Sela.
We are voting on everything now. Trying to reach consensus.
It's not easy, but it's how we want to move forward.
And we've decided to not go back on the blue.
We feel that it's the best course of action. That we can do better.
Hey, Chief, we just started those updates.
